member.name: T:BurstsOfRain.BurstsOfRainMain
member.summary: Main class for Bursts of Rain which contains the assembly loader.

member.name: F:BurstsOfRain.BurstsOfRainMain.NAME
member.summary: Human readable name of the mod

member.name: M:BurstsOfRain.BurstsOfRainMain.AddBurstAssembly(BepInEx.PluginInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new Burst compiled assembly to the Burst Runtime. The final path is with the 's and as the arguments.
member.param: The plugin that's adding the new assembly, this is also the starting directory for the assembly.
The name of the assembly to load.
member.returns: True if the assembly was loaded succesfully, otherwise it returns false.
